jbt.execution.core.event
Class TaskEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      jbt.execution.core.event.TaskEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TaskEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A TaskEvent is an event that is generated by tasks (ExecutionTask) to signal that a relevant change in the status of a task has taken place.

Author:
Ricardo Juan Palma Dur√°n

Constructor Detail

TaskEvent

public TaskEvent(ExecutionTask source,
                 ExecutionTask.Status newStatus,
                 ExecutionTask.Status previousStatus)
Creates a TaskEvent with a particular ExcutionTask as source of the event. The source (source) is the task whose status has changed, and newStatus is the new status of the task.

Parameters:
source - the task whose status has changed.
newStatus - the new status of the task.
